Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
how to install the pixel from my Shopify store

To install the NewsBreak Pixel on your Shopify store, follow these steps:
1. Log into your NewsBreak account and navigate to Tools > Ad Manager > Event Management.
2. Choose 'Pixel' as your tracking type, 'Shopify' as the integration method, and specify your event type. You can also turn on Event value if you have a value associated with this event.
3. Locate your base code in Step 1 and copy that code.
4. In your Shopify account, go to Settings > Customer events.
5. Create a unique name for your pixel.
6. Click 'Add pixel' to open the event editor.
7. Paste your custom JavaScript pixel code into the Code window.
8. Save the changes.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify).
I just did all of that, and now I do not see anything for the pixel on Ad manager

Let's make sure everything is set up correctly. First, can you confirm that you saved and connected the custom pixel in your Shopify settings? If so, the next step is to test your pixel integration. Here’s how you can do it:
1. Navigate back to Ad Manager > Event Management in your NewsBreak account.
2. Proceed to Step 3 to test your pixel integration.
3. If the pixel is integrated correctly, it should show up in Ad Manager.
If you're still having issues, it might be helpful to inform your account manager or operations team that the integration is complete so they can verify and perform necessary tests for you.
For more detailed information, please refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify).
